selected_quotes: A flood of low-quality biomed meta-analyses and reviews may be hiding valuable research misleading scientists
Flood of low-quality biomed meta-analyses and reviews may be hiding valuable research misleading scientists…
Torrent of low-quality meta-analyses and reviews in biomed might be hiding valuable research misleading scientist…
Interesting thoughts on reviews and meta-analyses...time to focus more on experiments and data collection?
Las producción en masa de revisiones científicas y de baja calidad empieza a ser un problema

citation.title: Mass production of review articles is cause for concern
